Plot: While settling his recently deceased father's estate, a salesman discovers he has a sister whom he never knew about, leading both siblings to re-examine their perceptions about family and life choices.
Title: People Like Us
Writer: Alex Kurtzman, Roberto Orci, Jody Lambert
Actors: Chris Pine, Elizabeth Banks, Michael Hall D'Addario, Michelle Pfeiffer
tomatoConsensus: Though calculated and melodramatic, People Like Us benefits from a pair of solid leads and its rare screenplay that caters to adult filmgoers.
